text: Joseph Knowles (16 December 1871 – 1955) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1871 births Category:1955 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:Footballers from Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Monkwearmouth F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Tottenham Hotspur F.C. players Category:South Shields F.C. title: Joe Knowles (footballer, born 1872)
